title: DIEU ET MON DROIT | Typefaces
content:
Hi everyone,

I just wanted to promote my brand new type portfolio: DIEU ET MON DROIT.

It's gathering some fonts that I've drawn, redrawn, customized or tweaked. You might have seen them in a magazine or a corporate identity and wondered what the hell was the font!? Otherwise, you'll discover my creations and feel free to leave your feedback down there.

URL: [www.dieuetmondroit.co.cc](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819155754/http:/www.dieuetmondroit.co.cc/ "www.dieuetmondroit.co.cc")

Enjoy your visit!
author: FF0000

comments.content:
Hi,

Just why do you present the type samples on a grey background? And why against math paper simulation? It difficults the visualization on those thin type strokes.. But I'm just giving my opinion. No grid, grey background optional... I would use white to be honest.  
 Good work :)
There seems to be something wrong with this link.
